title: NASA Announces 31st Human Exploration Rover Challenge Winners
description: NASA has announced the winning student teams in the 2025 Human Exploration Rover Challenge. This year’s competition challenged teams to design, build, and test a lunar rover powered by either human pilots or remote control. In the human-powered division, Parish Episcopal School in Dallas, Texas, earned first place in the high school division, and the […]
author: Lee Mohon

title: NASA Wallops Breaks Ground on New Causeway Bridge
description: NASA’s Wallops Flight Facility commemorated the start of construction of its new Wallops Island causeway bridge during a groundbreaking ceremony at 10 a.m., Monday, April 14, 2025, on the island.   The ceremony was held at the base of the old Wallops Island causeway bridge. Virgina state Sen. Bill DeSteph attended the groundbreaking, along with staffers […]
author: Jamie Adkins

title: How to spot Haumea, one of the solar system's strangest objects
description: Pluto isn’t the only dwarf planet in our solar system's outer reaches. Now is an ideal time to look for the egg-shaped Haumea, says Abigail Beall

title: Ringworld extract: Read a section from Larry Niven’s timeless classic
description: In this extract from the classic science fiction novel, the latest read for the New Scientist Book Club, we meet Ringworld’s protagonist Louis Wu, as he travels a future Earth

title: Katy Perry and Blue Origin crew return safely to Earth after space flight – video
description: Six women, including the pop star Katy Perry and the morning TV host Gayle King, have safely completed a trip into space. They used a rocket owned by Jeff Bezos, the Amazon co-founder and commercial space flight entrepreneur. His fiancee, Lauren Sánchez, was also on the flightBlue Origin crew including Katy Perry safely returns to Earth after space flight Continue reading...

title: Katy Perry, Jeff Bezos’ fiancee Lauren Sanchez and four others arrive back on Earth after space flight – as it happened
description: This live blog is now closed. For the latest on the flight, read our full report:Blue Origin crew including Katy Perry returns to Earth after space flightIt’s a clear, crisp morning in Texas. There’s a crackle of anticipation among the supporters gathered to watch the big launch.A lot at stake here. This launch could be the defining moment for Blue Origin’s reputation in space travel. Continue reading...

title: Gayle King just conquered her fears with Blue Origin's all-female space launch. Here's how she did it.
description: Journalist Gayle King conquered her fear of flying in a big way today (April 14), going to space with Katy Perry and others in Blue Origin's historic all-female flight.

title: 100th person to fly only a suborbital spaceflight | Space picture of the day for April 14, 2025
description: Aisha Bowe filled a milestone seat when she flew on Blue Origin's 11th human and first all-female spaceflight on April 14, 2025.
